# 工具网站合集

  1. browserSync 浏览器同步测试工具https://browsersync.bootcss.com/ (opens new window)
  2. 熊猫图片压缩https://tinypng.com/ (opens new window)
  3. css合并精灵图 https://www.toptal.com/developers/css/sprite-generator (opens new window)
  4. CDN中文网开源项目免费 CDN 加速服务 https://www.bootcdn.cn/ (opens new window)
  5. caniuse 查看兼容网站 https://caniuse.com/#search=gradient (opens new window)
  6. W3C 上传html检验标准工具https://validator.w3.org/#validate_by_upload+with_options (opens new window)
  7. 在线 表格转化md https://www.tablesgenerator.com/markdown_tables (opens new window)
  8. 各种转化工具（css、html、svg、json等） https://transform.tools/html-to-jsx (opens new window)
  9. webstorm系列 激活工具 https://3.jetbra.in/ (opens new window)
  10. 根据文件夹生成目录树工具 https://toolwa.com/dir-tree/ (opens new window)
  11. 图片高清修复 https://replicate.com/tencentarc/gfpgan (opens new window)
  12. OCR图片识别文字并提取：https://ocr.space/ (opens new window)
  13. window系统激活script：https://github.com/massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts (opens new window)
